snippet.title: AirMech Wastelands Trailer 2
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/595770/AirMech_Wastelands/

AirMech Wastelands is blasting into beta with better grouping, more parts, more ways to build out your mechs and your army!

The Action-RPG campaign of AirMech lets you continue using your existing account, just with all new features, missions and content.

http://airmech.com
